COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112
STRING: I headed to the far end of the hallway connecting the
practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e
STRING: To the place I was to meet Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: I decided to go see her on the first day she'd specified,
as I was interested in finding out what her voice and her
approach to music were like.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: Now that I think about it, I had only had a few
experiences of rehearsing with someone that I barely
knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: I was slightly nervous as I peeked through the small
window of the practice room door, but I spotted her
immediately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e
STRING: I was wondering what I should have said if she had
been singing, but there were no signs of her singing, as
she just sat at the piano reading the music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6
STRING: The rooms were soundproofed, so I doubted that she
would hear me knock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc
STRING: However, I knocked lightly on the door just in case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: [Chris] “Good afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, Chris... Hello there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250
STRING: She pushed the piano chair back and turned to face me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: [Fal] “How nice of you to come by so soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I didn't have any plans in particular, so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0
STRING: Now that I think about it, I had only had a few
experiences of rehearsing with someone that I barely
knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6
STRING: I was slightly nervous as I peeked through the small
window of the practice room door, but I spotted her
immediately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cc
STRING: I was wondering what I should have said if she had
been singing, but there were no signs of her singing, as
she just sat at the piano reading something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: The rooms were soundproofed, so I doubted that she
would hear me knock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30a
STRING: However, I knocked lightly on the door just in case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e
STRING: [Chris] “Good afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, Chris... Hello there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: She pushed the piano chair back and turned to face me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a2
STRING: [Fal] “How nice of you to come and see me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b8
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry I wasn't able to make it on Tuesday, I
had some things to care of.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f4
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, no, that's fine. After all, we were unable to
meet last week due to my engagements.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x414
STRING: She smiled casually while apologizing back to me, as if
she weren't bothered at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42a
STRING: [Chris] “That's a relief, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x440
STRING: Taking my bag from my shoulder, I started to wonder
what kind of approach to take, when Fal took the reigns
and began talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x472
STRING: [Fal] “I know this is sudden, but shall we just try
rehearsing something? Since it is our first attempt, I
really don't mind what song we use...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49c
STRING: [Chris] “It may be more practical for us to use a song
that we will actually play at the graduation recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4
STRING: [Fal] “I agree. You pen your own compositions, do you
not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e4
STRING: [Chris] “More or less, yes. Speaking of which, do people
in the vocal course also pen their own songs?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x504
STRING: 'Pen', huh... Why did I say that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52c
STRING: [Fal] “Is speaking formally that strange for you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x542
STRING: [Chris] “Well... Yes, was it that obvious?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x560
STRING: [Fal] “It is not often that I hear other people use the
term ‘pen a composition.’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x580
STRING: [Chris] “It sounds rather natural when you use that
expression, though, Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5bc
STRING: [Fal] “Perhaps I should be a little less formal, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d2
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x604
STRING: [Fal] “We are both in the same year, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61a
STRING: Saying this to me teasingly, I was reminded that we
actually were in the same year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64c
STRING: [Fal] “It'd be a bit odd if we kept talking like that after
becoming partners. If we do, that is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66c
STRING: Maybe it was because she was always in a position to
speak politely, but her eloquent use of words had
always seemed natural to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x682
STRING: But, she also sounds natural when speaking like any
other young girl, as she did just now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x698
STRING: [Chris] “That's true... So, shall we try to keep it casual,
then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b6
STRING: [Fal] “If you have no objections, then let us do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6cc
STRING: [Chris] “Done!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e2
STRING: We both kind of nodded in agreement, and then
returned to our discussion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: [Fal] “Alright, well, I've written some songs too. I wrote
some that should match the Fortelle, so in that sense
they should be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x716
STRING: [Chris] “You wrote with the Fortelle in mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x748
STRING: [Fal] “I was hoping to pair up with a Fortelle player, if
possible. But as there was no one who played it at the
time, I made the songs in a way that allowed for the
vocal solos,
[Fal] so it's all good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x772
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x788
STRING: What can I say, I was impressed by how thorough she
had been.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x794
STRING: Just from her attitude towards music, there was a big
difference between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a0
STRING: But she was the one that approached me wanting to try
rehearsing together, so I guess I didn't really need to be
concerned about any differences between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7dc
STRING: [Fal] “I'm not really sure what your songs are like, but I
guess we'll have to choose one of mine or yours.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fc
STRING: [Chris] “That is tru-I mean, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x812
STRING: Perhaps it was because I rarely spoke to other girls
besides Torta or Arie, but despite the fact we'd just
decided to stop being so formal, I was still being
awkward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: [Fal] “You can speak however you like, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x864
STRING: Despite my awkwardness, I did feel a certain comfort in
the friendly way Fal spoke to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87a
STRING: It's not like we had decided to partner up, but with that
in mind I decided I should try to speak as normally as
possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89a
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, I'm okay now. I'll speak how I always do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8cc
STRING: [Fal] “Saying you're okay still sounds a little strange,
but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fa
STRING: Anyway,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x928
STRING: about the song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x934
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, mind if I mention something about that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x952
STRING: [Fal] “Be my guest.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x968
STRING: I'd always practiced this song without anything in
particular in mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x974
STRING: Of course, it wasn't like I put nothing into its
composition.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x980
STRING: However, it was true that it wasn't composed with a
singer in mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x996
STRING: Perhaps Arie? But even then, that's a long shot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a2
STRING: It's not like I imagined her hilariously poor singing when
I composed it, though.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c2
STRING: It was a song I composed while thinking about Arie
after reading her letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d8
STRING: [Chris] “The song I composed... Might not suit you so
well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa14
STRING: [Fal] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2a
STRING: [Chris] “It was composed with a different singer in mind,
so it might not be in a key that suits your voice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: It wasn't a harmful lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa88
STRING: My song wouldn't have suited Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa94
STRING: [Chris] “So if it's okay, why don't we go with your song?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac6
STRING: [Fal] “I don't mind...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: After saying a few words, she went quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae8
STRING: She stared into my eyes, as if searching for something...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf4
STRING: And then her face lit up with a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: [Fal] “Sure, let's go with mine, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb32
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... Great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb64
STRING: [Fal] “This is good, the scores I copied won't go to
waste.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: I was relieved that she didn't attempt to pry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb86
STRING: But then I realized that I had completely forgotten
about the scores she had mentioned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9c
STRING: [Chris] “You've already made copies of yours? I had
completely forgotten...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbce
STRING: [Fal] “Oh really? Well, I guess you're in luck.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe4
STRING: Upon saying this, she reached into her bag and got out
the scores.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc02
STRING: [Fal] “Here you are. I was in a rush when I copied them,
so they might be a little messy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc18
STRING: I checked them the moment she said that, but I soon
realized she was just being humble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2e
STRING: The carefully written notes and symbols were done in
the shorthand way only an experienced musician would
write.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc44
STRING: However it hardly made them look messy, in fact it gave
an even stronger impression of their quality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5a
STRING: [Chris] “You think this is messy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc78
STRING: [Fal] “It is to me! Anyway, what do you think of the
song?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8e
STRING: Jokingly, she commented on the quality of her score.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9a
STRING: I sat myself down on the chair in front of my Fortelle,
and imagined the melody on the paper.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xccc
STRING: [Fal] “So, how is it...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce2
STRING: [Chris] “Just a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd22
STRING: Reading through the score, I traced the keys with my
fingertips.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd52
STRING: [Fal] “Chris, are you good at sight reading?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd68
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Yeah, I'm not bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd86
STRING: [Fal] “In that case, shall we just give it a try?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: [Chris] “Actually... Do you mind if I practice a little, first?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe00
STRING: [Fal] “Not at all, go ahead. I'll just sit and listen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe16
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. I won't take long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7a
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb4
STRING: [Fal] “Do you want to practice more before we start?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: [Chris] “That might be a good idea. Mind if I practice a
little more?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2e
STRING: [Fal] “Of course not, go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfae
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, I'm good now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfcc
STRING: [Fal] “In that case, shall we start?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, let's give it a shot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1006
STRING: [Fal] “Okay then, here we go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b2
STRING: [Fal] “Good job! That was impressive for a first attempt.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c8
STRING: [Chris] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fa
STRING: [Fal] “The sound of your Fortelle was just how I
imagined it would be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1110
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not really used to being complimented...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1142
STRING: [Fal] “There's no need to be shy, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: Fal seemed kind of happy when she said this, and then
took a peek at the score in front of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118a
STRING: [Fal] “At the moment, the only things I could comment
on are little things. Like... Here, or this part here, your
fingers weren't quite keeping up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b4
STRING: She suddenly moved her face closer to mine, and
pointed at a specific spot in the score.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c0
STRING: With her face so close to mine that I could almost feel
her breathe, my eyes didn't end up looking at what she
was pointing to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f2
STRING: [Fal] “Ohh...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1220
STRING: I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Uh, it's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124a
STRING: [Fal] “A-Anyway,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1278
STRING: that's the only issue I could see.
Ultimately we will have to perform it much better,
but for now I think we're fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1298
STRING: We were so close we almost touched, and even though
Fal moved away and tried to look calm, her face was
getting red.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: My heart hurt just a tiny little bit at the sight of that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c4
STRING: It was the exact same expression Arie had shown me
once before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d0
STRING: I don't think I was being excessively self conscious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12dc
STRING: But that expression on Fal's face was more than enough
to remind me of Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f2
STRING: [Chris] “That's kind of you to say...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1324
STRING: [Fal] “It's also true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: She seemed relieved as she spoke, probably because of
the change of topic and the wide berth it gave to what
just happened in the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1350
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks! So keeping what you just said in mind,
shall we practice a bit more?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1378
STRING: [Fal] “Sure, why not? We still have plenty of time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138e
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a4
STRING: The awkward atmosphere that had lingered soon
disappeared, and we both returned to our scores to
continue practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f4
STRING: [Fal] “And we're done! I guess this isn't bad for a first
attempt.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140a
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry, I kind of made a lot of mistakes, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1428
STRING: [Fal] “Well it was a sight reading after all; I don't think
we need to be too concerned.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. But I have to say, your singing was
impressive!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1470
STRING: [Fal] “Well, I have been putting a lot into my practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149e
STRING: We still have plenty of time ahead of us, so you could
do the same if you wanted.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b4
STRING: [Chris] “You have a point there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d2
STRING: [Fal] “We still have some more time; would you like to
rehearse some more?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, lets do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x151a
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, should I mention some of the points that
you should work on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153a
STRING: [Chris] “Please do. It'd be easier if you do it, you wrote
the song after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156c
STRING: [Fal] “True. Okay then, on the second page...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1582
STRING: She suddenly moved her face closer to mine, and
pointed at a specific spot in the score.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158e
STRING: With her face so close to mine that I could almost feel
her breathe, my eyes didn't end up looking at what she
was pointing to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c0
STRING: [Fal] “Oh?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ee
STRING: Ah... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15fa
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Uh, it's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1618
STRING: [Fal] “A-Anyway,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1646
STRING: in this part here, it seemed like your fingers weren't
moving well enough... Oh, but... Ultimately, as long as
we can perform it well!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1666
STRING: We were so close we almost touched, and even though
Fal moved away and tried to look calm, her face was
getting red.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1686
STRING: My heart hurt just a tiny little bit at the sight of that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1692
STRING: It was the exact same expression Arie had shown me
once before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169e
STRING: It's not that I was being excessively self-conscious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16aa
STRING: But that expression on Fal's face was more than enough
to remind me of Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c0
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah you're right, I think if I practice this
section here more, I should be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fc
STRING: [Fal] “...Yes. Either way, we're only just beginning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1712
STRING: She seemed relieved as she spoke, probably because of
the change of topic and the wide berth it gave to what
just happened in the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1730
STRING: [Fal] “Do you mind if we go on to the next point?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1746
STRING: [Chris] “No, please do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x175c
STRING: Maintaining a little more space than before, she
continued on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1768
STRING: We avoided further awkwardness, and both returned to
our scores to continue practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17de
STRING: [Fal] “Phew.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f4
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180a
STRING: Our practice for today ended with the two of us sighing
deeply.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1816
STRING: Perhaps it was because it had been a long time since I
had rehearsed with someone besides Phorni, or even
played new songs, but I quite enjoyed the practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182c
STRING: We couldn't see outside, but upon looking at the clock
on the wall, I realized that it was more or less evening
now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1854
STRING: [Fal] “Time really does pass quickly when practicing
seriously, doesn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186a
STRING: It was still too early for the school to be closed
completely, but it was about the time that our teachers
would do their rounds.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1880
STRING: We started to make an effort to pack up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188c
STRING: [Chris] “What should I do with this score?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18be
STRING: [Fal] “Hm? Oh, you can keep that. I don't really plan to
practice with anyone else at the moment, but if I do I'll
just make another copy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e8
STRING: [Chris] “I don't recall copying a score to be that easy,
though...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18fe
STRING: I remembered having to copy the scores of famous
compositions in class, and started to have my doubts
about it being something one can 'just do'.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1930
STRING: [Fal] “It's okay, I'm used to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195e
STRING: Also, I actually
don't mind writing out the scores.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1974
STRING: A smile lit up her face as she spoke, one that almost
suggested she really did enjoy it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198a
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a0
STRING: I was honestly impressed, and just for a brief moment, I
felt embarrassed about my own laziness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b6
STRING: One of the requirements for graduating was a
performance with another musician, and I hadn't found
a partner, or even prepared a score for that
hypothetical partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d6
STRING: Just seeing the dedication that Fal put in was enough to
engrave that into my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ec
STRING: [Chris] “You're really impressive...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1e
STRING: [Fal] “No, I'm not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a48
STRING: Fal smiled happily, and then picked up her bag, as if to
show she'd finished packing up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6c
STRING: Prompted by her I quickly put my score in my bag, and
we left the practice room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aba
STRING: Looking out the window, I noticed the rain had gotten
just a little lighter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac6
STRING: [Chris] “Are you heading home now, Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af8
STRING: [Fal] “No, not yet. I would like to leave with you, but I
don't think I can today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b18
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b42
STRING: We weren't exactly close enough for me to have felt
any pangs of regret.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4e
STRING: But I did feel... Something, about her words when she
said she 'would like to leave with me'.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b64
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going to head home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b82
STRING: [Fal] “Sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb0
STRING: Uh... Before you go, there's something
I'd like to ask you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bbc
STRING: [Chris] “What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bee
STRING: [Fal] “What did you think of today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c04
STRING: [Chris] “What did I think...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c36
STRING: [Fal] “Of my singing, or practice... That kind of thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4c
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I said so before, too, but I thought you
were really good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c88
STRING: [Fal] “You think so? Thanks.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb6
STRING: I really enjoyed
your Fortelle, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ccc
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks a lot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce2
STRING: Before I knew it, the uncomfortable feeling that I had
felt in the beginning, about playing with someone I
knew nothing about, had practically disappeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf8
STRING: It was all thanks to Fal, and how easygoing she was
about it all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d04
STRING: Even having only spent a very short amount of time with
her, I felt that it would be impossible for anyone not to
like her after witnessing how sincere she was

COMMANDS.LABEL: 1d04
STRING: towards music, and everything else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d24
STRING: I was no exception to this, and I smiled back at her
naturally as I asked about what we would do next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d3a
STRING: [Chris] “So, what's next?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6c
STRING: [Fal] “I guess you still want more time... Before
choosing a partner, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8c
STRING: [Chris] “I guess so, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1daa
STRING: [Fal] “In that case, I'm always here on Tuesdays and
Thursdays, so if you have time, why don't we practice
again?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dca
STRING: [Chris] “Sounds good, although I can't make any
promises.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dfc
STRING: [Fal] “That's no problem at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e12
STRING: [Chris] “Done. So, if I come by again, would it be okay at
about the same time as today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4e
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. I'll use the same room. If someone else
happens to be using it before me, I'll just move one
room down the hallway, so be sure to check through
the window.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e78
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, got it!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8e
STRING: I saw no problems in taking it slow to decide what we
should really do next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea4
STRING: And I felt it was important to have time to broaden
future options.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb0
STRING: [Chris] “So what are you going to do now, Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee2
STRING: [Fal] “I have some thing I have to do in the First Hall.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ef8
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, let's go to the entrance together, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f40
STRING: Standing in front of the school building, Fal spoke as
she looked up at the sky.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f68
STRING: [Fal] “I didn't bring an umbrella today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f7e
STRING: [Chris] “It's only raining lightly, so you should be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9c
STRING: [Fal] “You're right. Well, see you next time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd4
STRING: I stood and watched her nimbly walk off towards the
First Wing, and then I began to head back to the
rain-enveloped town.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2012
STRING: Just as I had told Fal, it was only raining lightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x201e
STRING: Normally my uniform would be soaked and clinging to
my skin, but today it wasn't so bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2034
STRING: Perhaps it was because of that lack of unpleasantness,
but today I took my time as I headed home.
